statements: SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status = 'completed'
SELECT transaction_id, amount, customer_id, timestamp, status FROM transactions WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_transactions >= 3 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT aggregated_id, total_amount, aggregation_date FROM aggregated_transactions ORDER BY aggregation_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, user_id FROM transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT anonymized_user_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY anonymized_user_id HAVING transaction_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_amount > 1000;
SELECT aggregated_id, total_amount, aggregation_date FROM aggregated_transactions WHERE transaction_count > 50 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS transaction_count, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT anonymized_user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY anonymized_user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT avg(amount) AS average_amount, max(amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_status = 'completed' AND amount < 500;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, transaction_status FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS highest_amount, MIN(amount) AS lowest_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;

SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, SUM(total_transactions) AS total_transactions FROM transactions JOIN aggregated_data ON transactions.timestamp = aggregated_data.analysis_timestamp WHERE analysis_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, user_id FROM transaction_data WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT category, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM aggregated_data GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, merchant_id FROM transaction_data WHERE amount >= 50 ORDER BY user_id, merchant_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT t.user_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_data t JOIN anonymized_data a ON t.user_id = a.anon_user_id GROUP BY t.user_id HAVING transaction_count > 5 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, merchant_id FROM transaction_data WHERE status = 'success';
SELECT card_number, timestamp FROM transaction_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transaction_data;
SELECT merchant_id, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transaction_data GROUP BY merchant_id;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp, card_number, merchant_id, status FROM transaction_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, transaction_count, average_amount, alert_status FROM analysis_data WHERE alert_status = true
SELECT gateway_name, success_rate, latency_ms FROM gateway_performance WHERE success_rate > 0.9 ORDER BY success_rate DESC
SELECT measure_name, measure_description FROM security_measures ORDER BY measure_id LIMIT 5

SELECT anonymized_data.anonymous_transaction_id, anonymized_data.masked_card_number, transaction_data.amount, transaction_data.merchant_id FROM anonymized_data JOIN transaction_data ON anonymized_data.merchant_id = transaction_data.merchant_id
